Description:
Detect PetitPotam coerced authentication activity.

Author: Mauricio Velazco, Michael Haag
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Possible PetitPotam Coerce Authentication Attempt
Query: sourcetype="windows-security" eventid="5145" sharename="\\\\\\\\*" sharename="*\\IPC$" relativetargetname="lsarpc" subjectusername="ANONYMOUS LOGON"
